pageContent: Purpose: We report local control outcomes, as assessed by posttreatment biopsies in patients who underwent 3-dimensional conformal radiotherapy for clinically localized prostate cancer. In addition, we report the influence of local tumor control on long-term distant metastases and cause specific survival outcomes.

metaData.source:
Long-term results of interstitial brachytherapy (LDR-Brachytherapy) in the treatment of patients with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16645877/
